name: Advanced bxKid
description:
Advanced bxKid is an expansion for bxKID inspired by MΣTΔ that includes:

  • ADVANCED WORLDS: play pretend in worlds the kids choose.
  • ADVANCED PRETENDING: play pretend without a DM, like most kids do!
  • ADVANCED CLASSES: play with advanced classes, like Wannabe Dungeon Master or Streamer without Views.

You can find bxKID (by M. A. Guax) here: https://maguax.itch.io/bxkid

You can find MΣTΔ (by myself) here: https://tragos-games.itch.io/meta
